import styles from "./css/Cart.module.css"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { increaseCount } from "./../store"; const Cart = () => { const cartData = useSelector((state) => state.cartData); const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log(cartData); return (

Cart

{cartData.map((item) => ( ))}
Product Quantity Price

{item.title}

SIZE : {item.size}
dispatch(increaseCount(item))} >
 $ {item.price * item.count}
); }; export default Cart;
